div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 98 Athens, c. 1932 (101) Burial: 4th cent. B.C. Contents: 20 AR Athens: tetradr. (5th-4th cent.) Disposition: Athens 20 (not 16 as originally reported Constantopoulos, BCH 1933, p. 238 The bronze coins mentioned in the report belong to another hd. of the imperial period
